list_page_teaser: I often get my friends to answer the questionnaire so I can learn more about them and draw their image.  View this gallery to see the resultant images, and learn about them as well.
description_html:
These are some images of my friends in Denver, drawn with the latest version of the Groja © program.

I will be adding more friends to this page, as I gather their scores and get their ok to add them, so check back soon!

image_list.title: Chantee H.
image_list.gallery_page_teaser: Click on the image to learn more!
image_list.explain_dom: The Red in Chantee's spiritual portrait represents her preference for making emotional rather than logical decisions.  In Introverts, the dominant trait is directed inwardly, and spiritual portraits use a long horizontal line to represent this.
image_list.explain_aux: The Blue in Chantee's spiritual portrait represents her openness and idealism.  In Introverts, the auxiliary trait is directed outwardly, and spiritual portraits use a vertical line to represent this, because it is more evident than the dominant function.
image_list.story_html:
Chantee lives in Denver, Colorado.

I will share more information as it becomes available.

image_list.title: Laura C
image_list.gallery_page_teaser: Click on the image to learn more!
image_list.explain_dom: The Green in this spiritual portrait represents Laura's dominant personality trait, her slight preference for objectivity over subjectivity.  In Extraverts, the dominant trait is directed outwardly, and spiritual portraits use a long vertical line to represent this, because it is the side of their personality that is most evident.
image_list.explain_aux: The Blue in this spiritual portrait represents Laura's auxiliary personality trait, her slight preference for ideas over facts.  In Extraverts, the auxiliary trait is directed inwardly, and spiritual portraits use a horizontal line to represent this.
image_list.story_html:
Laura lives in Denver, Colorado.

I will share more information as it becomes available.

image_list.title: Sharyl S
image_list.gallery_page_teaser: Sharyl's spiritual portrait shows she is ....  Click on the image to learn more!
image_list.explain_dom: The Yellow in this spiritual portrait represents Sharyl's dominant personality trait, her realism.  In Introverts, the dominant trait is directed inwardly, and spiritual portraits use a long horizontal line to represent this.
image_list.explain_aux: The Green in this spiritual portrait represents Sharyl's auxiliary personality trait, her objectivity.  In Introverts, the auxiliary trait is directed outwardly, and spiritual portraits use a vertical line to represent this, because it is more evident than the dominant function.
image_list.story_html:
Sharyl lives in Denver, Colorado.

I will share more information as it becomes available.
image_list.story_html_img: Idea: only include images with stories for family and friends.

image_list.title: Steven S
image_list.gallery_page_teaser: Click on the image to learn more!
image_list.explain_dom: The Blue in this spiritual portrait represents Steven's dominant personality trait, his openness to ideas.  In Extraverts, the dominant trait is directed outwardly, and spiritual portraits use a long vertical line to represent this, because it is the side of their personality that is most evident.
image_list.explain_aux: The Red in this spiritual portrait represents Steven's auxiliary personality trait, his amiability.  In Extraverts, the auxiliary trait is directed inwardly, and spiritual portraits use a horizontal line to represent this.
image_list.story_html:
Steven lives in Denver, Colorado.

I will share more information as it becomes available.

image_list.title: Veronica M.
image_list.gallery_page_teaser: Click on the image to learn more!
image_list.explain_dom: The Blue in Veronica's spiritual portrait represents her openness and idealism.  In Extraverts, the dominant function is directed outwardly, and spiritual portraits use a long vertical line to represent this.
image_list.explain_aux: The Red in Veronica's spiritual portrait represents her preference for making emotional decisions.  In Extraverts, the auxiliary function is directed inwardly and is less evident than the dominant function.
image_list.story_html:
Veronica lives in Denver, Colorado.

I will share more information as it becomes available.
